title: Syndra Ultimate!
body:
Lets talk about {{champion:134}} 

In my opinion her ultimate is a bit too "easy".

It should reward you more the more balls you stack.

I think her ult damage should look like this:

First Ball: 50/90/140 damage + 18% AP

and then every ball deals 10 + 2% Damage EXTRA.

This way with lvl 3 ultimate if she would have 7 balls the final ball would deal 200 + 30% AP damage.


Why this change would be good? it'd mean that setup would be much more important. If you walk into a ball field you are dead, but she can't just 100 - 0 you without setting up the balls first.

it'd also be good for soloQ/ competitive balance since pro players should be better at avoiding ball fields, and thus she wouldn't be a 100% pick/ban.

replies.body:
Durrr.

More syndra ragethreads inc, handle agro.

She already can't 100-0 with just 3 balls anyway. You're suggestion is, no offense, pointless because it's exactly how it works already. More spheres=More damage. 
The only you'll die with a 3 sphere ult is if you're really low, or she did a standard combo, which still isn't a 3 sphere ult either way.
